name: CoTCR
tagline: Formalisation of a proof of soundness of corecursive type-class resolution
body:
# Welcome to CoTCR
This is a formalisation of a proof of soundness of corecursive type-class resolution as in Farka _et al._ [1]

## Documentation
The source code is documented in-line in comments, a [highlighted version](http://frantisekfark.gihub.io/cotcr/html) is provided.

### Authors and Contributors
Just @frantisekfarka for now.


## References 

[1] ...
